name: ON THE BLOCKCHAIN by Shark Anthony

metadata.name: ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
metadata.description: ON THE BLOCKCHAIN is an original song from Shark Anthony. Played in Spaces over many months, this track is the perfect example of a recording artist developing an idea with their audience in real-time. This song is an anthem for the Web3 community & a response to anyone dismissing this moment in art, tech, and financial history. Written, recorded, produced, mixed, mastered, and designed by Shark Anthony. The cover is an abstract voxel art render of the blockchain, intended as a contrast to the straight-forward lyrics & upbeat instrumental of the song. Feel free to reach out to Shark on a variety of social media platforms to learn more about this digital edition of the single. All rights reserved.
